info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 2:20AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Hamlin and southeastern Clark Counties through 345 AM CDT... At 319 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bryant, or 15 miles north of Lake Thompson State Recreation Area, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Norden, Hamlin Education Center, Kellerton Church and Hayti. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
